item.title: Democrats predict passing Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' will cost many...Republicans their seats
item.description: Trump's sweeping tax cuts pass the House, igniting a political firestorm over Medicaid and setting up a showdown in the Senate and upcoming elections.

item.title: Federal judge blocks Trump admin from firing 2 Dem members of privacy oversight board
item.description: A federal judge blocked President Donald Trump from firing Democratic members of a federal oversight board, arguing their jobs were protected.
